extension.summary: Smart intro/outro detection and skipping for TV shows
电视剧智能片头/片尾检测与跳过
extension.description: This add-on automatically detects and remembers intro/outro times for TV shows. Features include: - Automatic show and episode detection - Saves intro/outro times for future playback - Smart chapter detection using ffmpeg (will notify if not installed) - Chapter-based or manual time input for setting skip times - Configurable skip settings and database options
此插件可自动检测并记录电视剧的片头/片尾时间点。 核心功能包括： - 自动检测电视剧及剧集 - 保存片头/片尾时间点，供后续播放使用 - 基于 ffmpeg 的智能章节检测（若未安装将提示） - 支持通过章节或手动输入时间设置跳过时段 - 可配置跳过设置及数据库选项
